learneasy.homepage

Class HomePage

  • java.lang.Object
    • learneasy.homepage.HomePage

  • public class HomePage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class displays a dialog box prompting the user to choose a default LearnEasy folder and stores the file path of recently opened lessons.
    Version:
    1.0 25/05/15
    Author:
    Daniel Berhe

    • Constructor Detail

      • HomePage

        public HomePage()
        Constructor for instialising local variables and setting the default folder to user home folder. If nothing is already stored, the file path of the default folder is stored.
